content: > a free version of this pattern is > available here > http //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2017/02/simple-double-crochet-bulky-hat html perfect for babies children and adults this super soft bulky hat works up quickly and uses simple stitches to create its textured appearance this is a beginner level pattern great for chemo caps and charity hat drives these hats are sized to fit and instructions are included for both base of earlobe and mid ear lengths ♥ rhondda #redheartyarns #joycreators
